replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
- 1 hit kill/destroy. (Except bedrock)
- Right-click throws hammer, explodes when it hits the floor. You get it back of course!
- Deals no damage.
- Forged with tons of the greatest fun within a dying super star!

秒杀
右击扔出 爆炸 可取回
对自己没伤害？

lz啊。。
